```{=html}
<details id="accessibility-controls">
    <summary>Display options</summary>
  
    <div class="control-group">
        <label for="fontSizeSlider">Font size</label>
        <input type="range" id="fontSizeSlider" min="8" max="32" value="16">
        <span id="fontSizeValue">16</span>px
    </div>
  
    <div class="control-group">
        <label for="eyeStrainSlider">Eye strain</label>
        <input type="range" id="eyeStrainSlider" min="0" max="50" value="0">
        <span id="eyeStrainValue">0</span>%
    </div>
  
    <div class="control-group">
        <label for="hueRotateSlider">Hue</label>
        <input type="range" id="hueRotateSlider" min="0" max="360" value="0">
        <span id="hueRotateValue">0</span>
    </div>
  
    <div class="control-group">
        <label for="paddingSlider">Padding</label>
        <input type="range" id="paddingSlider" min="0" max="12" value="0">
        <span id="paddingValue">0</span>
    </div>
  
    <div class="control-group">
        <label for="lineSpacingSlider">Spacing</label>
        <input type="range" id="lineSpacingSlider" min="80" max="250" value="150">
        <span id="lineSpacingValue">150</span>%
    </div>
  
    <div class="control-group">
        <label for="fontFamily">Font family</label>
        <select id="fontFamily">
            <option value="'Atkinson Hyperlegible', sans-serif">Atkinson Hyperlegible</option>
            <option value="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif">Sans-serif</option>
            <option value="Georgia, 'Bitstream Charter', Times, serif">Serif</option>
        </select>
    </div>
  
    <div class="control-group">
        <button id="resetDefaults">Reset to Defaults</button>
    </div>

</details>
```
